Programm

Workshop Program


14:00 - 14:10 Workshop Opening
14:10 - 14:40 Keynote: Thomas Natschläger (Dynatrace)
Title: Generative AI and Software Intelligence
Abstract: I would like to talk about this from two perspectives: How to use generative AI to generate DQL (Dynatrace query language designed for analytics in the observability domain): requirements, challenges, open questions from an industrial point of view. How to shape an observability product towards AI observability.
14:40 - 15:10 Phillip Kogler, Andreas Falkner, Simon Sperl
Reliable Generation of Formal Specifications Using Large Language Models
15:10 - 15:30 Reflexion round & questions
15:30 - 16:00 Coffee Break
16:00 - 16:10 Dr. Rubén Ruiz-Torrubiano
Introduction to Generative AI in Software Engineering Teaching
16:10 - 16:40 Prof. Dr. Kurt Schneider
Presentation of challenges and issues of Generative AI in current SE teaching
16:40 - 17:30 Panel discussion: Generative AI in SE teaching
Panel discussion with experts from academia and industry about current challenges involving Generative AI in teaching informatics in higher education.
17:30 - 18:00 Reflexion round & end of workshop
